languages.text: "Я уже начинал планировать рейды на шпиль... и кто же явился ко мне в тот миг? Ты. Дракон кабала, который жаждал вернуть милость Черного сердца. Ты просил союза ради укрепления верности Опустошительной бури. Уверял в своей преданности Черному сердцу. Признаться, на мгновение я даже задумался о рокировке... но это мгновение растаяло без следа при мысли, что я могу разорвать Опустошительную бурю изнутри, не подняв и пальца".

"I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."
languages.original_text: "Я уже начинал планировать рейды на шпиль... и кто же явился ко мне в тот миг? Ты. Дракон кабала, который жаждал вернуть милость Черного сердца. Ты просил союза ради укрепления верности Опустошительной бури. Уверял в своей преданности Черному сердцу. Признаться, на мгновение я даже задумался о рокировке... но это мгновение растаяло без следа при мысли, что я могу разорвать Опустошительную бурю изнутри, не подняв и пальца".

traits.locale_text: "I was already starting to plan raids on the spire... and who came to me at that moment? You did. The Kabal Dracon who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, I was even considering a castling move.... but that moment melted away at the thought that I could tear the Reaving Tempest from the inside without having to lift a finger."

"I was already starting to plan raids on the spire... and who came to me at that moment? You did. The Kabal Dracon who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, I was even considering a castling move.... but that moment melted away at the thought that I could tear the Reaving Tempest from the inside without having to lift a finger."

You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

"I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

languages.text: "Ich hatte gerade begonnen, Angriffe auf den Turm zu planen ... und wer kommt da zu mir? Ausgerechnet? Ihr. Der Dracon der Kabale, der die Gunst des Schwarzen Herzens wiedergewinnen wollte. Ihr habt um ein Bündnis gebeten, um die Loyalität des plündernden Sturms zu stärken. Ihr habt Eure Treue geschworen. Ich gestehe, dass ich einen Augenblick lang sogar in Erwägung gezogen habe, Euch zum Archonten zu machen ... Doch dieser Augenblick verpuffte bei der Vorstellung, den plündernden Sturm von innen heraus zu herreißen, ohne einen Finger rühren zu müssen."
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

Ich gestehe, dass ich einen Augenblick lang sogar in Erwägung gezogen habe, Euch zum Archonten zu machen ... Doch dieser Augenblick verpuffte bei der Vorstellung, den plündernden Sturm von innen heraus zu herreißen, ohne einen Finger rühren zu müssen."

languages.text: “在我刚刚准备计划突袭尖塔时……是谁主动找上了我？是你，阴谋团的裁决官。你渴望重获黑心阴谋团的青睐，你愿意宣誓效忠，与我结为联盟，让狂风更加忠诚。我承认，有那么一会儿，我甚至真的考虑过让你来当执政官……不过，当我意识到，我甚至连一根手指都不用动，就能将狂风阴谋团从内部撕开之后，这样的想法就消失了。”
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: “在我刚刚准备计划突袭尖塔时……是谁主动找上了我？是你，阴谋团的裁决官。你渴望重获黑心阴谋团的青睐，你愿意宣誓效忠，与我结为联盟，让狂风更加忠诚。我承认，有那么一会儿，我甚至真的考虑过让你来当执政官……不过，当我意识到，我甚至连一根手指都不用动，就能将狂风阴谋团从内部撕开之后，这样的想法就消失了。”

languages.text: « Je venais de commencer à organiser nos raids sur la tour... quand soudain, qui voilà ? Vous. Le Dracon de la Kabale qui entendait reconquérir les faveurs du Cœur Noir. Vous avez demandé une alliance visant à renforcer la loyauté de la Tempête ravageuse. Vous avez prêté allégeance. Pour tout vous avouer, j'ai momentanément envisagé de vous nommer archonte... Mais cette envie m'est passée lorsque j'ai pensé à disloquer la Tempête ravageuse de l'intérieur sans même avoir à lever le petit doigt. »
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: « Je venais de commencer à organiser nos raids sur la tour... quand soudain, qui voilà ? Vous. Le Dracon de la Kabale qui entendait reconquérir les faveurs du Cœur Noir. Vous avez demandé une alliance visant à renforcer la loyauté de la Tempête ravageuse. Vous avez prêté allégeance. Pour tout vous avouer, j'ai momentanément envisagé de vous nommer archonte... Mais cette envie m'est passée lorsque j'ai pensé à disloquer la Tempête ravageuse de l'intérieur sans même avoir à lever le petit doigt. »

languages.text: «Acababa de empezar a planear un asalto a la torre... ¿y quién vino a mí? Tú. El Dracón de la Kábala, ansioso por recuperar el favor del Corazón Negro. Me pediste una alianza para reforzar la lealtad de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me juraste lealtad. Confieso que por un momento me planteé instalarte como Arconte... pero la idea se esfumó en cuanto vi que podía destruir la Tempestad Asoladora desde dentro sin mover un dedo».
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: «Acababa de empezar a planear un asalto a la torre... ¿y quién vino a mí? Tú. El Dracón de la Kábala, ansioso por recuperar el favor del Corazón Negro. Me pediste una alianza para reforzar la lealtad de la Tempestad Asoladora. Me juraste lealtad. Confieso que por un momento me planteé instalarte como Arconte... pero la idea se esfumó en cuanto vi que podía destruir la Tempestad Asoladora desde dentro sin mover un dedo».

languages.text: 「ちょうどその尖塔への襲撃を計画し始めた時、誰が私の元に来るだろうか？君だ。〈黒き心臓〉の信頼を回復したいと切望している陰謀団のドラコン。リーヴィング・テンペストへの忠誠を高めるべく同盟を求めた。君は忠誠を誓った。正直に言うと、君をアーコンとして迎えるという考えに束の間楽しんだりもした…しかし少しの手間もかけずにリーヴィング・テンペストを内部から引き裂くという考えに至った瞬間、その妄想は消え失せた」
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: 「ちょうどその尖塔への襲撃を計画し始めた時、誰が私の元に来るだろうか？君だ。〈黒き心臓〉の信頼を回復したいと切望している陰謀団のドラコン。リーヴィング・テンペストへの忠誠を高めるべく同盟を求めた。君は忠誠を誓った。正直に言うと、君をアーコンとして迎えるという考えに束の間楽しんだりもした…しかし少しの手間もかけずにリーヴィング・テンペストを内部から引き裂くという考えに至った瞬間、その妄想は消え失せた」

languages.text: "Kuledeki baskın planlarını yapmaya daha yeni başlamıştım. Sonra karşıma kim çıktı? Sen. Kabal'ın Drakon'u. Kara Yürek'in lütfunu geri kazanmak istiyordun. Müfteris Kasırga'yı daha sadık hâle getirecek bir ittifak teklif ettin. Bağlılığını ilan ettin. İtiraf etmeliyim ki bir anlığına seni Arkon ilan etme düşüncesi bile aklımdan geçti ama o düşünce, Müfteris Kasırga'yı parmağımı oynatmadan içten parçalama düşüncesinin yanında eridi gitti."
languages.original_text: "I had just begun planning raids on the spire... when who should come to me? You. The Kabal's Dracon, who longed to regain the favour of the Black Heart. You asked for an alliance to bolster the loyalty of the Reaving Tempest. You pledged your allegiance. I confess, for a moment I even entertained the thought of installing you as Archon... but that moment melted away at the thought of tearing the Reaving Tempest apart from the inside without having to lift a finger."

traits.locale_text: "Kuledeki baskın planlarını yapmaya daha yeni başlamıştım. Sonra karşıma kim çıktı? Sen. Kabal'ın Drakon'u. Kara Yürek'in lütfunu geri kazanmak istiyordun. Müfteris Kasırga'yı daha sadık hâle getirecek bir ittifak teklif ettin. Bağlılığını ilan ettin. İtiraf etmeliyim ki bir anlığına seni Arkon ilan etme düşüncesi bile aklımdan geçti ama o düşünce, Müfteris Kasırga'yı parmağımı oynatmadan içten parçalama düşüncesinin yanında eridi gitti."
